<a id="ColorRect"></a>

# ColorRect

**Inherits:** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A control that displays a solid color rectangle.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Displays a rectangle filled with a solid [color](ColorRect.md#ColorRect_property_color). If you need to display the border alone, consider using a [Panel](Panel.md) instead.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [2D Dodge The Creeps Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2712)
